title: A Thousand Tiny Failures: Memoirs of a Pickup Artist
description: Sebastian had man-boobs, and life was a bummer...until he got surgery and discovered an online community of Pickup Artists. Moving to Montreal, he stumbles into a world of parties, sex, drugs, and drama â€“ only to emerge with a new, but questionable understanding of himself, women, and the human condition. Have you ever wondered, how long will it take to find success with women? Does this Pickup Artist stuff really work?What compels a man to relentlessly flirt for sport, and at what cost?Part instruction manual, part hipster-Unicorn sexual adventure story, A Thousand Tiny Failures is a hilarious and addicting novel, for men who want to improve, and women who want to understand.
author: Tony D.
